Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory207.png'}
{3: "The man-made beach extends as far as the eye can see, and even Constellia's silver skyline disappears from view."}
{3: "The waves glimmer faintly behind the ash grove. It's hard to believe this futuristic city sets aside such an expansive area for a tropical park."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Wow, this place is huge! Is this really Constellia's seaside go-kart track?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Bridget's gaze, you spot gray streaks amid the endless gold beneath the watchtower. Rising heat from the asphalt distorts the air, blurring everything in the distance."}
{2: "It's so hot. Should we take a break under those trees?", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "No need! Our missions take place everywhere, and staying adaptable is exactly what lets me jump in and back you up whenever it's needed...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stops talking, turns to the side, and flashes a bright, easygoing smile.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's not talk about the missions anymore. I'm the one who invited you, so going on about that now is a total buzzkill!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'That last sim race was such a rush!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'For this holiday invitation, I want you to experience the real adrenaline surge of a high-speed race!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Bridget coolly adjusts the sunglasses resting just above her bangs.'}
{2: '(Head to the track with her)', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Commandant, go ahead and pick any vehicle you like!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Which coating do you prefer?', 3: '21', 4: 'Quick—check which one got the best performance!', 5: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hmm, let's go with that orange go-kart on Track Four!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hah! So you want me to just size it up by eye? They might all be the same model, but little details—like how worn the tires are—really do set them apart.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She stands next to the bright orange chassis, examining the tires and body as if she's conducting a professional assessment."}
{2: 'Visitor A', 3: "If I'm being honest, this go-kart feels more like a retro off-road buggy."}
{2: 'Visitor B', 3: "It's definitely not a model you see every day. Think it'll be tough to drive?"}
{3: "You overhear complaints. Even though you've studied how to handle old-style vehicles at F.O.S., you rarely get to put that training into practice."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'What do you say, Commandant? Sure you can handle it?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's give it a try.", 3: '33', 4: 'I\'m a seasoned "Cool Racing 23" player, so we\'re all set!', 5: '33'}
{3: "You rarely get to use old-style vehicles in real situations, but you've definitely learned the skills at F.O.S."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Alright, hop on board. I've got this covered!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory207.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'You duck down into the seat and settle beside Bridget in front of the control panel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Here—your helmet.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As soon as you sit down, she offers you a piece of protective gear painted in the same orange color.'}
{2: '(Put on the helmet and buckle up)', 3: '45'}
{3: 'You stretch out your arms and fix your gaze on the clutch and throttle.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey, hey, hey—take it easy. Better safe than...', 4: '1'}
{3: "It's that familiar driver-safety line; whenever you ride with her, you always hear it a few times."}
{3: 'As she reminds you about safety, she straps you on shoulder, elbow, and wrist guards.'}
{3: "It's like being packed into a sturdy power suit all over again."}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '55', 4: 'Something funny?', 5: '57'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh, nothing's wrong. It's just that seeing you head out like this puts me at ease.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'm just thinking about this old tire company mascot from the Golden Age... You look just as cute right now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's a weird comparison...", 3: '60'}
{3: "You're about to ask what she means when the start buzzer suddenly blares in your ears."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Let's go!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She rests her hand on the secondary steering wheel that shares control of the main drive.'}
{2: '(Release the clutch, step on the gas)', 3: '67'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The car gives a quick shudder and surges over the black-and-white checkered start line.'}
{3: 'With each turn and overtake, Bridget responds in an instant. The wheel feels light and deft in her hands, almost like a toy she can maneuver with ease.'}
{3: "You can only feel the warm sea breeze passing by. Before you know it, you're back at the starting line."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory207.png'}
{3: 'Once the race is over, the tourists chill in the shade, while the champion—no surprise—stretches out on her towel without a care.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Sunbathing with a chilled alcohol-flavor electrolyte drink? It's absolutely perfect!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gulps down a big mouthful of the icy drink and smacks her lips in pure satisfaction.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You know, the only real drawback is these blazing UV rays. If I keep going like this, my bionic skin's gel layer will age in no time...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't you say something like the frame will adapt by itself...?", 3: '90', 4: '(Adjust the parasol)', 5: '93'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't be so clueless! Come on, help me put on some sunscreen gel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Commandant, can you help me with this sunscreen gel?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wait... what?!', 3: '95', 4: 'Help you with... the sunscreen gel?', 5: '95'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hey, why the fuss? This is part of keeping our frames in good shape. If I lie face-down, it's hard for me to reach my back, alright?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You accept the hose she offers, squeeze out a sticky, pale lotion, and rub it gently between your hands. Then you press your palms against the skin in front of you.'}

{3: "It's more... elastic than you anticipate. As you spread the lotion, a soothing warmth settles into your fingertips—so warm, you can't tell if it's just the sunlight or the vital fluid beneath her skin."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yeah, that's the spot. Whew... that feels amazing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Actually... on a holiday like this, isn't racing a bit out of place?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sits up partway, and the cheerful note in her voice suddenly softens.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Back in the convoy days, I watched my fair share of old Double Seventh Festival-themed films...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'So, I got to know plenty of festival traditions that way. But fireworks or wishes—they were all luxuries from before everything fell apart.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Even then, it struck me as unbelievable that, not long ago, people actually took the time to honor a myth like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So instead of copying a festival I've never experienced and juggling details I don't know, I decide to stick with an activity I'm comfortable with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Commandant... I'm being too willful, aren't I?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Not at all. I'm having a great time today.", 3: '113'}
{2: 'Happy Double Seventh Festival, Bridget.', 3: '114'}
{3: 'She suddenly buries her face in the towel blanket, making it impossible to see her expression.'}
{3: "Should you keep going with the massage? While you're hesitating, the familiar, cheerful voice suddenly interrupts your train of thought."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ah! Hurry up and drink. Your cold drink is practically turning into hot soup in this sun, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget suddenly straightens up and fixes her gaze on the bottle in your hand.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Cheers!', 4: '1'}
